description.value: Your excellent time management allows you to work on multiple projects at once. If you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heroic-crafting.heroic-crafting-actions.Item.omioiKwEf6AFyBBP]{Craft a Project} for at least 1 day, you can work on 2 projects simultaneously. If you are legendary in Crafting, you can work on 3 projects simultaneously. Each project requires you to contribute materials and make checks separately. Table 1: Spending Limit specifies the amount you can spend on each project. A batch of consumables counts as a single project, and your Spending Limit is multiplied by the size of the batch.
